descriptionHtml:
-> Taking a break from Skyrim for a while. Busy studying for exams.

Dragonstand

Description:

This mod adds a player home in Riverwood. A very small player home.

It is located across the inn. 

-> In order to get the key you must set on an adventure. Read Frey\'s Journal under the chair on the front porch of the house for clues of his whereabouts (this does not add a quest to your journal).

Features:

-  2 functional windows (to see the sky and lighten the place)
-  Front porch (with chair and a lean marker near the wall)
-  Unique alchemy and enchanting workbenches
-  Torch sconce (if you want better lighting)
-  1 Shield and 1 weapon plaque
-  2 weapon racks
-  1 bookshelf with 30 book slots.
-  Lots of storage space (5 chests, 1 urn, 1 alchemy satchel, 1 knapsack, 1 strongbox)
-  1 bed (it\'s a bedroll, but do not worry, you\'ll fit)
-  1 desk (three end tables to store documents and whatnot)

Updates: 

v1.1
- added a back porch with cooking pot and harvestable ingredients
v1.2
- added a barrel for food storaging on the back porch (under the table)
- added a shrine of Talos for curing diseases (top shelf)
v1.3
- added a basement (it is an armory, Dragonstand style)
- added a rug under the desk
- fixed an issue where Frodar would sometimes sit on your porches
v.1.3.1
- fixed the navmesh in Riverwood
v.1.3.2
- fixed some minor problems
v.1.3.3
- added a small safe on one of the bookshelfs (conceal it with books)
- fixed navmesh, again

Installation

- Unzip and drop the Dragonstand.esp in your Skyrim data folder.
- Delete it if you want to uninstall. Do not forget to take your stuff out before you do so.
- When updating, for safety and just in case, remove your items from the house first.

Additional Information

- Due to the small size of the home, your companion(s) will have to wait for you outside.
- I will not help you solve FreyÂ´s mystery. The quest is simple enough. Use deduction.

- Please report any bugs that might have slipped my testing. Complaining does not count. Remember that I made this mod for myself and I am just sharing it with you.
- English is not my first language so forgive me if I made some mistakes while writing the quest or this description.
- You can do whatever you wish with the mod as long as you credit me for it.
author: anotherm
